Home » 40P12 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
17 Saraṇaduka, Saññojanadukādi
Saraṇaduka, Saññojanadukādi
48.
169Nasaraṇaṃ nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
170Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate pañca.
49.
171Nasaraṇaṃ noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nasaraṇaṃ nooghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nasaraṇaṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nasaraṇaṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nasaraṇaṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
172Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate pañca.
